mapper.sql: b.id as id, b.name as name, b.path as path, b.type as type, b.size as size, b.remark as remark, b.is_view as isView, b.create_id as createId, b.create_time as createTime, b.update_id as updateId, b.update_time as updateTime, b.usable as usable
